x.description: The x coordinate of the location

y.description: The y coordinate of the location

z.description: The z coordinate of the location

humanReadable.description: Human readable location name like terminal 2 or terminal 1

area.description: Area identification like room numbers or the name of corridors

mapImage.description: The title image of the service

openingHours.description: The opening of the services at this dedicated location

column1.description: The left item (first columng) of the table. Its allowed to put everything here like a date or a header. The text will not be formated and has to be in the correct format.

column2.description: The right item (second column) of the table. Its allowed to put everything here like a date or a header. The text will not be formated and has to be in the correct format.
